chat_history.message:
Hello, My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: I haven't received my order since it was delayed and never communicated when it will be delivered. Kindly assist Order # 41281646

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Could you please contact UPS to find out why the parcel wasn't delivered?

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have informed my logistics partner of this issue and await the POD.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. Please let us know if the customer wishes to contest.

Regards,
RK
